title: What to do
body: Like 20 minutes in our jungle dc'd. I was ahead and I think mid and bot were pretty even or just slightly ahead. What should we have done to end the game quickly because we were losing majority of team fights especially as it got later in the game. Thanks !

replies.body: it depends on what your team had and what the opponents team had but since you were losing team fights as you said it might have been better to split delay (split push while other team delays)

> [{quoted}](name=Chibi Chobi dash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VZnxAz7v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-13T00:00:29.123+0000)
>
> it depends on what your team had and what the opponents team had but since you were losing team fights as you said it might have been better to split delay (split push while other team delays)

yeah. if someone feeds i make 2 of us deny surrender so we can delay/farm/outpush :D
